title: Foxworth Friday: Breaking down the Brian Flores Situation
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth break down all angles of former Dolphins coach Brian Flores' lawsuit against the Giants and the NFL for discrimination, including Patriots coach Bill Belichick's mistaken text to Flores (1:29) as well as “tanking” allegations against Miami owner Stephen Ross (28:55).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
